<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_table_builder.TBDeleteRecords</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Delete all Table records</description>
        <name>TBDeleteRecords</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TBDeleteRecords = Class.create();
TBDeleteRecords.prototype = {
    initialize: function(table) {
        this.table = table;
    },

    build: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(this.table);
        var canDelete = gr.canDelete();
        if (canDelete) {
            gr.query();
            if (gr.next())
                gr.deleteMultiple();
            return {
                message: gs.getMessage('Records deleted successfully')
            };
        } else {
            return {
                canDelete: false,
                message: gs.getMessage("You do not have permission to delete this data.")
            };
        }
    },

    type: 'TBDeleteRecords'
};]]></script>
